channel.title: Great Batch Utility
channel.description:
Im feeling really nice today so i decided i was gonna release my great Server Utility have fun!
[b][size=40pt]leave comment or i remove[/size][/b]
[code]@echo off :co1 set b=0 set t=7 goto co2 :co2 color %b%%t% :password goto menu echo Type the password set /p password=Password: if %password%==gsxr1000 goto menu goto error3 :menu cls title Alexscape Server Utility COLOR 0a echo. echo //////////////////////////*Alex's Server Utility*\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\ echo. echo /////////////////////////////*Created By Alex*\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\ echo. echo. echo ///////////////*You will need JDK 1.6.0_02 to use this compiler*\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\ echo. echo //////*WARNING: If you use this to delete files you cannot recover them*\\\\\\\ echo. echo. echo Commands: echo. echo Type CP for Compiler Credits(READ IF YOU USE PERFECT COMPILER) echo Type runescape for a list of worlds echo Type FU to bring up a list of Firefox websites echo Type UU to Update the Utility Tool echo Type CO to Compile server echo Type RS to Runserver echo Type CR to Compile And Run echo Type SH to get server help echo Type B to make a Server Backup echo Type S to run Silabsoft Client (Only if its in your source folder) echo Type C to clear all character files and information echo Type J to use the Jar Maker echo Type E to exit this utility echo. set /p option=Option: if %option%==j goto jar if %option%==J goto jar if %option%==color goto color if %option%==Color goto color if %option%==COLOR goto color if %option%==runescape goto rsworlds if %option%==B goto backup if %option%==b goto backup if %option%==c goto areyousure if %option%==C goto areyousure if %option%==e goto exit if %option%==E goto exit if %option%==CO goto compiler if %option%==Co goto compiler if %option%==co goto compiler if %option%==cO goto compiler if %option%==SH goto serverhelp if %option%==Sh goto serverhelp if %option%==sh goto serverhelp if %option%==sH goto serverhelp if %option%==RS goto runserver if %option%==Rs goto runserver if %option%==rs goto runserver if %option%==rS goto runserver if %option%==CR goto comprun if %option%==Cr goto comprun if %option%==cr goto comprun if %option%==cR goto comprun if %option%==CP goto copyright if %option%==Cp goto copyright if %option%==cp goto copyright if %option%==cP goto copyright if %option%==UU goto updateitnow if %option%==Uu goto updateitnow if %option%==uU goto updateitnow if %option%==uu goto updateitnow if %option%==FU goto firefoxuser if %option%==Fu goto firefoxuser if %option%==fU goto firefoxuser if %option%==fu goto firefoxuser if %option%==s goto silabsoft if %option%==S goto silabsoft if %option%==* goto error
:menu2 goto menu
:color cls echo Would you like to change the backround color, change echo the text color, or reset it to default? echo. echo back - Change the backround color. echo text - Change the text color. echo def - Change all colors back to default. echo. echo. set /p color=Option: if %color%==back goto back if %color%==BACK goto back if %color%==text goto text if %color%==TEXT goto text if %color%==def goto co1 if %color%==DEF goto co1 if %color%==* goto error goto error
:text cls echo Please select a color to change the text to: echo. echo black echo white echo red echo yellow echo green echo blue echo purple echo. echo. set /p back=Color: if %back%== black (set t=0) if %back%== white (set t=7) if %back%== red (set t=4) if %back%== yellow (set t=6) if %back%== green (set t=2) if %back%== blue (set t=1) if %back%== purple (set t=5) goto co2
:back cls echo Please select a color to change the backround to: echo. echo black echo white echo red echo yellow echo green echo blue echo purple echo. echo. set /p back=Color: if %back%== black (set b=0) if %back%== white (set b=7) if %back%== red (set b=4) if %back%== yellow (set b=6) if %back%== green (set b=2) if %back%== blue (set b=1) if %back%== purple (set b=5) goto co2
:areyousure cls set /p areyousure=Are You Sure You Want To Delete All Char Files(Y/N): if %areyousure%==y goto areyousure2 if %areyousure%==Y goto areyousure2 if %areyousure%==n goto menu if %areyousure%==N goto menu cls
:areyousure2 cls set /p areyousure2=Last chance are you positive(Y/N): if %areyousure2%==y goto clear if %areyousure2%==Y goto clear if %areyousure2%==n goto menu if %areyousure2%==N goto menu cls
:clear cls del /F /S /Q characters del /F /S /Q flagged del /F /S /Q flaggedauto del /F /S /Q connectedfrom del /F /S /Q moreinfo del /F /S /Q savedgames echo All character related information has been deleted now pause goto menu cls
:exit exit
:compiler cls if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error2)
:compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") echo Results: if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) pause cls if defined p (goto end)
:error2 echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. echo. echo If you dont want to download type DDL set /p option=Are you useing mozilla: if %option%==Y goto loadcooliesite if %option%==y goto loadcooliesite if %option%==N goto unternetexplorer if %option%==n goto unternetexplorer if %option%==DDL goto menu
:unternetexplorer "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://www.google/showthread.php?t=20629
:loadcooliesite echo Loading Please Wait "%programfiles%\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp "%programfiles%\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe" http://www.google/showthread.php?t=20629
:end echo Finished! pause goto menu
:runserver cls java -cp . server pause CALL compiler CALL server runner goto menu
:comprun cls if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error2) echo Files Comiled Succesfully
:compileraddon java -cp . server pause CALL compiler CALL server runner goto menu
:silabsoft cls JAVA -Xmx500m -jar client.jar 0 0 highmem members 0 goto menu
:error cls echo An error has occured echo Press enter to go back to the main menu pause cls goto menu
:copyright cls echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: echo ::: Created By Alex(A.E.M.) ::: echo ::: Pink Bunnys Entertainment © ::: echo ::: Copyright 2007© ::: echo ::: Server maker - Dog Eats's Dog ::: echo ::: Backup Maker - Syrillia ::: echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: pause cls goto menu
:error3 cls echo Please type the correct password set /p weeeee=Password: if %weeeee%==gsxr1000 goto menu goto error4
:error4 cls echo Please type the correct password this is your last try set /p weeeee=Password: if %weeeee%==gsxr1000 goto menu goto error5
:error5 echo Wrong set /p enter=Please Press the ENTER button on your keyboard to continue if %enter%== goto exit goto exit
:updateitnow cls "%programfiles%\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe" http://alexscape.no-ip.org/Alex's_Perfect_Server_Utility.bat del Alex's_Perfect_Server_Utility.bat cls goto menu
:backup echo Backing up files... if not exist Backup mkdir Backup if not exist Backup\characters mkdir Backup\characters if not exist Backup\connectedFrom mkdir Backup\connectedFrom if not exist Backup\data mkdir Backup\data if not exist Backup\flagged mkdir Backup\flagged if not exist Backup\logs mkdir Backup\logs if not exist Backup\moreinfo mkdir Backup\moreinfo if not exist Backup\savedGames mkdir Backup\savedGames Echo Starting Backup Copy copy /V /Y /A *.txt .\Backup\ copy /V /Y /A *.java .\Backup\ copy /V /Y /A *.class .\Backup\ copy /V /Y /A *.cfg .\Backup\ copy /V /Y /A *.bat .\Backup\ copy /V /Y /A bans .\Backup\bans copy /V /Y /A characters .\Backup\characters copy /V /Y /A characters .\Backup\characters copy /V /Y /A connectedFrom .\Backup\connectedFrom copy /V /Y /A data .\Backup\data copy /V /Y /A flagged .\Backup\flagged copy /V /Y /A logs .\Backup\logs copy /V /Y /A moreinfo .\Backup\moreinfo copy /V /Y /A savedGames .\Backup\savedGames echo Done echo. echo Credits Syrilla for Backup code pause cls goto menu
:serverhelp Title Dog Eats Dog's Server Making Helper cls Echo This information was giving by God of Ikiliki, All Credit Is given to him Echo Not Me But i have written this, But again the information came from him Pause Echo. Echo Chapter One - Getting JDK Echo. Echo To get JDK goto - http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp echo. set /p webopen1=Do you want it to automatically open site(FIREFOX USER)(Y/N): if %webopen1%==Y goto webopener1 if %webopen1%==y goto webopener1 if %webopen1%==N goto serverhelp2 if %webopen1%==n goto serverhelp2 :webopener1 "%programfiles%\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp goto serverhelp2 :serverhelp2 Echo. Echo Click JDK 6 Update 2, you will get a popup, click Yes. Echo Check the box 'I agree' and click on one of the 2 downloads you can choose and Echo install it. echo. pause Echo. Echo Downloading and Installing No-IP Echo. Echo You can download No-IP from the official site - www.no-ip.org echo. set /p webopen2=Do you want it to automatically open site(FIREFOX USER)(Y/N): if %webopen2%==Y goto webopener2 if %webopen2%==y goto webopener2 if %webopen2%==N goto serverhelp3 if %webopen2%==n goto serverhelp3 :webopener2 "%programfiles%\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe" http://www.no-ip.org goto serverhelp3 :serverhelp3 Echo. Echo Click on the register tab and register an account. Echo If you are there click the Downloads tab. Echo. Echo. Echo In this tutorial I will teach everything for windows So click Windows. Echo Now click on the link/image to download.com, Echo and you can download and install it through that page. Echo Once you installed No-IP you will have a button on your desktop to run it. Echo Run it and No-Ip will open. Echo. Echo. Echo Click the 'Here' button to add a new IP. Echo Let the page load and you will see a, Add a Host - Button click it to Echo Make a new IP Echo This page will have 2 Fields, Hostname information and E-Mail settings. Echo Ignore the Email field and Click Hostname Echo. Echo. Echo At the first text field fill in your server name. Echo The Ip Address part will auto change to your IP, do not change it. Echo Once you're done click 'Create Host' at the bottom and click the 'Refresh' at the No-IP Echo Menu on your computer. Echo. Echo. Pause Echo. Echo Getting a Client Echo. Echo. Echo To get a client, I advise you use the Moparscape Client Found at the Echo Forums - www.moparisthebest.com/smf And Click the Download Moparscape echo. set /p webopen3=Do you want it to automatically open site(FIREFOX USER)(Y/N): if %webopen3%==Y goto webopener3 if %webopen3%==y goto webopener3 if %webopen3%==N goto serverhelp4 if %webopen3%==n goto serverhelp4 :webopener3 "%programfiles%\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe" http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf goto serverhelp4 :serverhelp4 Echo. Echo Button Echo. Echo. Echo Opening 43594 (Default Port) Echo. Echo Open Network and -Internet Connections Echo Right click on the connection you're using to Echo the internet and click properties. Open the Advanced tab and click on Echo firewall settings. Echo Open the Exceptions tab and at the bottom you should see a button "Add Port" Echo Click on it, and add your server name or whatever Echo you want it to be at the Name field. Echo And make sure the TCP box has been checked. Echo. Echo. Echo Port forwarding (Router Users, Using Linksys) Echo. Echo You don't use linksys? Find your router at Echo http://www.portforward.com/english/routers/port_forwarding/routerindex.htm echo. set /p webopen4=Do you want it to automatically open site(FIREFOX USER)(Y/N): if %webopen4%==Y goto webopener4 if %webopen4%==y goto webopener4 if %webopen4%==N goto serverhelp5 if %webopen4%==n goto serverhelp5 :webopener4 "%programfiles%\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe" http://www.portforward.com/english/routers/port_forwarding/routerindex.htm goto serverhelp5 :serverhelp5 Echo. Echo And Follow the Tutorial Echo. Echo Open your cmd by going to Start > Run > cmd. Type in `ipconfig´ Echo It will Say your Default gateway, Copy it into your Internet Browser Echo You should see a box prompting you for your username and password. Echo Enter your username and password now. Echo By default the username is blank, and the password is admin. Echo Click the Ok button to log in to your router. Echo. Echo Click Applications/g a m i n g Echo The menu under that should change. Echo In this new menu, click Port Range Forwarding. Echo. Echo When you're finished, click Save Settings near the bottom of the screen Echo To save your changes pause Echo. Echo Getting a source Echo To make your own server You need a source, The most important key Echo to make a server. To download one goto www.moparisthebest.com/smf Echo And click Moparscape Downloads, But watch out, Some sources Echo Contain Trojens and Keyloggers. Echo On the source Click client.java and Browse through the script and look Echo for things to change pause Echo. Echo I did not paste everything in his tutorial, Like Editing source To add Echo NPC and Make your Self Admin, But if you want to know how Echo (best Option) goto Echo http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,200036.0.html echo. set /p webopen5=Do you want it to automatically open site(FIREFOX USER)(Y/N): if %webopen5%==Y goto webopener5 if %webopen5%==y goto webopener5 if %webopen5%==N goto serverhelp6 if %webopen5%==n goto serverhelp6 :webopener5 "%programfiles%\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe" http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,200036.0.html goto serverhelp6 :serverhelp6 Echo. pause cls goto menu
:rsworlds title Runescape World Select cls echo Runescape World Selecter echo. echo FIREFOX USERS ONLY echo. echo To select select worlds type in a world below: echo. echo 1 echo 58 echo 90 echo 108 echo. set /p rsworldpick=Enter World: if %rsworldpick%==58 goto w58 if %rsworldpick%==108 goto w108 if %rsworldpick%==90 goto w90 if %rsworldpick%==1 goto w1 if %rsworldpick%==m goto menu if %rsworldpick%==M goto menu :w1 echo Loading World start worlds/world1.html tskill cmd.exe :w90 echo Loading World start worlds/world90.html goto rsworlds :w108 echo Loading World start worlds/world108.html goto rsworlds :w58 echo Loading World start worlds/world58.html goto rsworlds
:firefoxuser title Website Fetcher cls echo Website Fetcher echo. echo Websites: echo Rune-Server-Forums - http://www.google/forums.php echo Moparscape-Forums - http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf echo Runelocus-Forums - http://www.rs2gods.net/runelocus echo Rune-eve - http://www.rune-evolution.com echo Mrquarter - http://www.sylvion.com echo Runefreeze - http://www.runefreeze.com echo Type M to go to the Main Menu echo. echo More to be added echo Alex echo. set /p fuwebsite=Enter Website Name(NOCAPS): if %fuwebsite%==rune-server-forums goto runeserver if %fuwebsite%==runelocus-forums goto runelocus if %fuwebsite%==moparscape-forums goto moparscapesite if %fuwebsite%==rune-eve goto runevel if %fuwebsite%==mrquarter goto mrq if %fuwebsite%==runefreeze goto runefreeze if %fuwebsite%==m goto menu
:runefreeze "%programfiles%\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe" http://www.runefreeze.com goto firefoxuser
:runevel "%programfiles%\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe" http://www.rune-evolution.com goto firefoxuser
:mrq "%programfiles%\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe" http://www.sylvion.com goto firefoxuser
:runeserver "%programfiles%\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe" http://www.google/forums.php goto firefoxuser
:moparscapesite "%programfiles%\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe" http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf goto firefoxuser
:runelocus "%programfiles%\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe" http://www.rs2gods.net/runelocus goto firefoxuser[/code]

item.title: Great Batch Utility
item.dc:creator: @coalman58 coalman58
item.description:
@coalman58 wrote:

[quote=“dog eats dog, post:9, topic:157626”]Rofl, Yet again i can see the password A.E.M -.- gsxr1000

Also mine still does more then yours :), and even to great things XD

Run Server
Compile
Information on the utility
Start Silab
Start Mopar
Forums (to go to moparscape forums)
Error Report
Command Generator Made by me
Shop Maker made by me

Tutorial on how to make a server “By god of ikiliki”
Change color of the utility
page 2 for client,
run client
compile client
tuts on clients

2 more things on your utility, And it will be good, But i haft to admit it is good, I just has things it doesn’t need.

Exit the utility? Client the x button.

List of worlds for runescape? why not just go to runescape.com

But mate, Good job, My advise make something like i did, Shop maker for example, You can make something like…Ummm…Client maker.
Example" But i was going to do that, It won’t be hard “Much” Lol.
But you can do it, Up to you.

So yes, This is a good utility mate.[/quote]Can I have the code for your compiler?Send it to me if you can in a message

Read full topic

echo Type CP for Compiler Credits(READ IF YOU USE PERFECT COMPILER)
echo Type runescape for a list of worlds
echo Type FU to bring up a list of Firefox websites
echo Type UU to Update the Utility Tool
echo Type CO to Compile server
echo Type RS to Runserver
echo Type CR to Compile And Run
echo Type SH to get server help
echo Type B to make a Server Backup

echo Type J to use the Jar Maker

item.title: Great Batch Utility
item.dc:creator: @A.E.M A.E.M.
item.description:
@A.E.M wrote:

Im feeling really nice today so i decided i was gonna release my great Server Utility have fun!

[size=40pt]leave comment or i remove[/size]

[code]@echo off
:co1
set b=0
set t=7
goto co2
:co2
color %b%%t%
:password
goto menu
echo Type the password
set /p password=Password:
if %password%==gsxr1000 goto menu
goto error3
:menu
cls
title Alexscape Server Utility
COLOR 0a
echo.
echo //////////////////////////Alex’s Server Utility\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\
echo.
echo /////////////////////////////Created By Alex\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\
echo.
echo.
echo ///////////////You will need JDK 1.6.0_02 to use this compiler\\\\\\\\
echo.
echo //////WARNING: If you use this to delete files you cannot recover them\\\
echo.
echo.
echo Commands:
echo.
echo Type CP for Compiler Credits(READ IF YOU USE PERFECT COMPILER)
echo Type runescape for a list of worlds
echo Type FU to bring up a list of Firefox websites
echo Type UU to Update the Utility Tool
echo Type CO to Compile server
echo Type RS to Runserver
echo Type CR to Compile And Run
echo Type SH to get server help
echo Type B to make a Server Backup
echo Type S to run Silabsoft Client (Only if its in your source folder)
echo Type C to clear all character files and information
echo Type J to use the Jar Maker
echo Type E to exit this utility
echo.
set /p option=Option:
if %option%==j goto jar
if %option%==J goto jar
if %option%==color goto color
if %option%==Color goto color
if %option%==COLOR goto color
if %option%==runescape goto rsworlds
if %option%==B goto backup
if %option%==b goto backup
if %option%==c goto areyousure
if %option%==C goto areyousure
if %option%==e goto exit
if %option%==E goto exit
if %option%==CO goto compiler
if %option%==Co goto compiler
if %option%==co goto compiler
if %option%==cO goto compiler
if %option%==SH goto serverhelp
if %option%==Sh goto serverhelp
if %option%==sh goto serverhelp
if %option%==sH goto serverhelp
if %option%==RS goto runserver
if %option%==Rs goto runserver
if %option%==rs goto runserver
if %option%==rS goto runserver
if %option%==CR goto comprun
if %option%==Cr goto comprun
if %option%==cr goto comprun
if %option%==cR goto comprun
if %option%==CP goto copyright
if %option%==Cp goto copyright
if %option%==cp goto copyright
if %option%==cP goto copyright
if %option%==UU goto updateitnow
if %option%==Uu goto updateitnow
if %option%==uU goto updateitnow
if %option%==uu goto updateitnow
if %option%==FU goto firefoxuser
if %option%==Fu goto firefoxuser
if %option%==fU goto firefoxuser
if %option%==fu goto firefoxuser
if %option%==s goto silabsoft
if %option%==S goto silabsoft
if %option%==* goto error

:menu2
goto menu

:color
cls
echo Would you like to change the backround color, change
echo the text color, or reset it to default?
echo.
echo back - Change the backround color.
echo text - Change the text color.
echo def - Change all colors back to default.
echo.
echo.
set /p color=Option:
if %color%==back goto back
if %color%==BACK goto back
if %color%==text goto text
if %color%==TEXT goto text
if %color%==def goto co1
if %color%==DEF goto co1
if %color%==* goto error
goto error

:text
cls
echo Please select a color to change the text to:
echo.
echo black
echo white
echo red
echo yellow
echo green
echo blue
echo purple
echo.
echo.
set /p back=Color:
if %back%== black (set t=0)
if %back%== white (set t=7)
if %back%== red (set t=4)
if %back%== yellow (set t=6)
if %back%== green (set t=2)
if %back%== blue (set t=1)
if %back%== purple (set t=5)
goto co2

:back
cls
echo Please select a color to change the backround to:
echo.
echo black
echo white
echo red
echo yellow
echo green
echo blue
echo purple
echo.
echo.
set /p back=Color:
if %back%== black (set b=0)
if %back%== white (set b=7)
if %back%== red (set b=4)
if %back%== yellow (set b=6)
if %back%== green (set b=2)
if %back%== blue (set b=1)
if %back%== purple (set b=5)
goto co2

:areyousure
cls
set /p areyousure=Are You Sure You Want To Delete All Char Files(Y/N):
if %areyousure%==y goto areyousure2
if %areyousure%==Y goto areyousure2
if %areyousure%==n goto menu
if %areyousure%==N goto menu
cls

:areyousure2
cls
set /p areyousure2=Last chance are you positive(Y/N):
if %areyousure2%==y goto clear
if %areyousure2%==Y goto clear
if %areyousure2%==n goto menu
if %areyousure2%==N goto menu
cls

:clear
cls
del /F /S /Q characters
del /F /S /Q flagged
del /F /S /Q flaggedauto
del /F /S /Q connectedfrom
del /F /S /Q moreinfo
del /F /S /Q savedgames
echo All character related information has been deleted now
pause
goto menu
cls

:exit
exit

:compiler
cls
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error2)

:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
echo Results:
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
pause
cls
if defined p (goto end)

:error2
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
echo.
echo If you dont want to download type DDL
set /p option=Are you useing mozilla:
if %option%==Y goto loadcooliesite
if %option%==y goto loadcooliesite
if %option%==N goto unternetexplorer
if %option%==n goto unternetexplorer
if %option%==DDL goto menu

:unternetexplorer
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://www.google/showthread.php?t=20629

:loadcooliesite
echo Loading Please Wait
“%programfiles%\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
“%programfiles%\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe” http://www.google/showthread.php?t=20629

:end
echo Finished!
pause
goto menu

:runserver
cls
java -cp . server
pause
CALL compiler
CALL server runner
goto menu

:comprun
cls
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error2)
echo Files Comiled Succesfully

:compileraddon
java -cp . server
pause
CALL compiler
CALL server runner
goto menu

:silabsoft
cls
JAVA -Xmx500m -jar client.jar 0 0 highmem members 0
goto menu

:error
cls
echo An error has occured
echo Press enter to go back to the main menu
pause
cls
goto menu

:copyright
cls
echo ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
echo ::: Created By Alex(A.E.M.) :::
echo ::: Pink Bunnys Entertainment © :::
echo ::: Copyright 2007© :::
echo ::: Server maker - Dog Eats’s Dog :::
echo ::: Backup Maker - Syrillia :::
echo ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
pause
cls
goto menu

:error3
cls
echo Please type the correct password
set /p weeeee=Password:
if %weeeee%==gsxr1000 goto menu
goto error4

:error4
cls
echo Please type the correct password this is your last try
set /p weeeee=Password:
if %weeeee%==gsxr1000 goto menu
goto error5

:error5
echo Wrong
set /p enter=Please Press the ENTER button on your keyboard to continue
if %enter%== goto exit
goto exit

:updateitnow
cls
“%programfiles%\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe” http://alexscape.no-ip.org/Alex’s_Perfect_Server_Utility.bat
del Alex’s_Perfect_Server_Utility.bat
cls
goto menu

:backup
echo Backing up files…
if not exist Backup mkdir Backup
if not exist Backup\characters mkdir Backup\characters
if not exist Backup\connectedFrom mkdir Backup\connectedFrom
if not exist Backup\data mkdir Backup\data
if not exist Backup\flagged mkdir Backup\flagged
if not exist Backup\logs mkdir Backup\logs
if not exist Backup\moreinfo mkdir Backup\moreinfo
if not exist Backup\savedGames mkdir Backup\savedGames
Echo Starting Backup Copy
copy /V /Y /A *.txt .\Backup
copy /V /Y /A *.java .\Backup
copy /V /Y /A *.class .\Backup
copy /V /Y /A *.cfg .\Backup
copy /V /Y /A *.bat .\Backup
copy /V /Y /A bans .\Backup\bans
copy /V /Y /A characters .\Backup\characters
copy /V /Y /A characters .\Backup\characters
copy /V /Y /A connectedFrom .\Backup\connectedFrom
copy /V /Y /A data .\Backup\data
copy /V /Y /A flagged .\Backup\flagged
copy /V /Y /A logs .\Backup\logs
copy /V /Y /A moreinfo .\Backup\moreinfo
copy /V /Y /A savedGames .\Backup\savedGames
echo Done
echo.
echo Credits Syrilla for Backup code
pause
cls
goto menu

:serverhelp
Title Dog Eats Dog’s Server Making Helper
cls
Echo This information was giving by God of Ikiliki, All Credit Is given to him
Echo Not Me But i have written this, But again the information came from him
Pause
Echo.
Echo Chapter One - Getting JDK
Echo.
Echo To get JDK goto - http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
echo.
set /p webopen1=Do you want it to automatically open site(FIREFOX USER)(Y/N):
if %webopen1%==Y goto webopener1
if %webopen1%==y goto webopener1
if %webopen1%==N goto serverhelp2
if %webopen1%==n goto serverhelp2
:webopener1
“%programfiles%\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
goto serverhelp2
:serverhelp2
Echo.
Echo Click JDK 6 Update 2, you will get a popup, click Yes.
Echo Check the box ‘I agree’ and click on one of the 2 downloads you can choose and
Echo install it.
echo.
pause
Echo.
Echo Downloading and Installing No-IP
Echo.
Echo You can download No-IP from the official site - www.no-ip.org
echo.
set /p webopen2=Do you want it to automatically open site(FIREFOX USER)(Y/N):
if %webopen2%==Y goto webopener2
if %webopen2%==y goto webopener2
if %webopen2%==N goto serverhelp3
if %webopen2%==n goto serverhelp3
:webopener2
“%programfiles%\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe” http://www.no-ip.org
goto serverhelp3
:serverhelp3
Echo.
Echo Click on the register tab and register an account.
Echo If you are there click the Downloads tab.
Echo.
Echo.
Echo In this tutorial I will teach everything for windows So click Windows.
Echo Now click on the link/image to download.com,
Echo and you can download and install it through that page.
Echo Once you installed No-IP you will have a button on your desktop to run it.
Echo Run it and No-Ip will open.
Echo.
Echo.
Echo Click the ‘Here’ button to add a new IP.
Echo Let the page load and you will see a, Add a Host - Button click it to
Echo Make a new IP
Echo This page will have 2 Fields, Hostname information and E-Mail settings.
Echo Ignore the Email field and Click Hostname
Echo.
Echo.
Echo At the first text field fill in your server name.
Echo The Ip Address part will auto change to your IP, do not change it.
Echo Once you’re done click ‘Create Host’ at the bottom and click the ‘Refresh’ at the No-IP
Echo Menu on your computer.
Echo.
Echo.
Pause
Echo.
Echo Getting a Client
Echo.
Echo.
Echo To get a client, I advise you use the Moparscape Client Found at the
Echo Forums - www.moparisthebest.com/smf And Click the Download Moparscape
echo.
set /p webopen3=Do you want it to automatically open site(FIREFOX USER)(Y/N):
if %webopen3%==Y goto webopener3
if %webopen3%==y goto webopener3
if %webopen3%==N goto serverhelp4
if %webopen3%==n goto serverhelp4
:webopener3
“%programfiles%\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe” http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf
goto serverhelp4
:serverhelp4
Echo.
Echo Button
Echo.
Echo.
Echo Opening 43594 (Default Port)
Echo.
Echo Open Network and -Internet Connections
Echo Right click on the connection you’re using to
Echo the internet and click properties. Open the Advanced tab and click on
Echo firewall settings.
Echo Open the Exceptions tab and at the bottom you should see a button “Add Port”
Echo Click on it, and add your server name or whatever
Echo you want it to be at the Name field.
Echo And make sure the TCP box has been checked.
Echo.
Echo.
Echo Port forwarding (Router Users, Using Linksys)
Echo.
Echo You don’t use linksys? Find your router at
Echo http://www.portforward.com/english/routers/port_forwarding/routerindex.htm
echo.
set /p webopen4=Do you want it to automatically open site(FIREFOX USER)(Y/N):
if %webopen4%==Y goto webopener4
if %webopen4%==y goto webopener4
if %webopen4%==N goto serverhelp5
if %webopen4%==n goto serverhelp5
:webopener4
“%programfiles%\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe” http://www.portforward.com/english/routers/port_forwarding/routerindex.htm
goto serverhelp5
:serverhelp5
Echo.
Echo And Follow the Tutorial
Echo.
Echo Open your cmd by going to Start > Run > cmd. Type in `ipconfig´
Echo It will Say your Default gateway, Copy it into your Internet Browser
Echo You should see a box prompting you for your username and password.
Echo Enter your username and password now.
Echo By default the username is blank, and the password is admin.
Echo Click the Ok button to log in to your router.
Echo.
Echo Click Applications/g a m i n g
Echo The menu under that should change.
Echo In this new menu, click Port Range Forwarding.
Echo.
Echo When you’re finished, click Save Settings near the bottom of the screen
Echo To save your changes
pause
Echo.
Echo Getting a source
Echo To make your own server You need a source, The most important key
Echo to make a server. To download one goto www.moparisthebest.com/smf
Echo And click Moparscape Downloads, But watch out, Some sources
Echo Contain Trojens and Keyloggers.
Echo On the source Click client.java and Browse through the script and look
Echo for things to change
pause
Echo.
Echo I did not paste everything in his tutorial, Like Editing source To add
Echo NPC and Make your Self Admin, But if you want to know how
Echo (best Option) goto
Echo http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,200036.0.html
echo.
set /p webopen5=Do you want it to automatically open site(FIREFOX USER)(Y/N):
if %webopen5%==Y goto webopener5
if %webopen5%==y goto webopener5
if %webopen5%==N goto serverhelp6
if %webopen5%==n goto serverhelp6
:webopener5
“%programfiles%\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe” http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,200036.0.html
goto serverhelp6
:serverhelp6
Echo.
pause
cls
goto menu

:rsworlds
title Runescape World Select
cls
echo Runescape World Selecter
echo.
echo FIREFOX USERS ONLY
echo.
echo To select select worlds type in a world below:
echo.
echo 1
echo 58
echo 90
echo 108
echo.
set /p rsworldpick=Enter World:
if %rsworldpick%==58 goto w58
if %rsworldpick%==108 goto w108
if %rsworldpick%==90 goto w90
if %rsworldpick%==1 goto w1
if %rsworldpick%==m goto menu
if %rsworldpick%==M goto menu
:w1
echo Loading World
start worlds/world1.html
tskill cmd.exe
:w90
echo Loading World
start worlds/world90.html
goto rsworlds
:w108
echo Loading World
start worlds/world108.html
goto rsworlds
:w58
echo Loading World
start worlds/world58.html
goto rsworlds
